links.description: Credit Suisse AG announced its intent to delist and suspend further issuance of the VelocityShares 3x Inverse Crude Oil ETN (NYSEARCA: DWTI) and the VelocityShares 3x Long Crude Oil ETN (NYSEARCA: UWTI) effective December 8, 2016, becoming the largest closure in history. However, the exchange-traded notes will not be called, redeemed, or liquidated.
